review:
Its been a year since insaw Dr Dorai Kumar. A very friendly doctor, zero alarm ie..however worried or concerned I was about a condition, he explained it so clearly and satisfactorily that i gained maximum confidence, my mental state was strengthened that even my healing process was so fast! I can now drive, walk anywhere, stand for as long as i want, climb hills etc in short, live my life comfortably after treatment. Kudos to the doctor. The hospital was very comfortable.
I also commend the excellent and proffessional service of the administrator Mr Balaji.

review: Nice explanation & treatment. No waiting time and immediate consultation hope to see the better results
I m not satisfied with his treatment. No proper examination was done.i don't want to go again for my treatment
Dr. Durai Kumar They have changed my life. I have a broken leg for two years. I am not well yet. He did not see me properly.

Took my dad who had a small injury on his right leg. doctor immediately arranged for x ray and assured us that there was nothing to worry about. has a very calming presence and explains the problem well.
Very calm composed and understanding. Clear instructions and very supportive.Does not alarm the patient at all.
